rescuecore2.registry

Class FilterMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.registry.FilterMessageFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageFactory

    public class FilterMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageFactory
    A message factory that filters urns that do not match a given set.

                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> urns,
                    boolean inclusive)
        Construct a FilterMessageFactory.
        Parameters:
        downstream - The downstream message factory.
        urns - The set of URNs.
        inclusive - True if the set of URNs are allowed, false if they are forbidden.

      • makeMessage

        public Message makeMessage(java.lang.String urn,
                  java.io.InputStream data)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: MessageFactory
        Create a message based on its urn and populate it with data from a stream. If the urn is not recognised then return null.
        Specified by:
        makeMessage in interface MessageFactory
        Parameters:
        urn - The urn of the message type to create.
        data - An InputStream to read message data from.
        Returns:
        A new Message object, or null if the urn is not recognised.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading the stream.
